scripts.reset: git reset --hard HEAD && git clean -fd && git pull
scripts.pushsave: git add save/tidal_* && git commit -m c && git push
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m c && git push
scripts.compare: git pull && node compare && git add napsterAccount.txt && git commit -m c && git push
scripts.initn: /sbin/ip route del 5.189.154.0/24 via 5.189.154.1 dev ens18 && /sbin/ip route add 5.189.154.0/24 dev ens18 proto kernel scope link src 5.189.154.39 && expressvpn connect nl
scripts.inits: /sbin/ip route del 5.189.185.0/24 via 5.189.185.1 dev ens18 && /sbin/ip route add 5.189.185.0/24 dev ens18 proto kernel scope link src 5.189.185.48 && expressvpn connect nl
scripts.inity: /sbin/ip route del 173.249.43.0/24 via 173.249.43.1 dev ens18 && /sbin/ip route add 173.249.43.0/24 dev ens18 proto kernel scope link src 173.249.43.6
scripts.rmcache: ipcs -p | grep micro | awk 'NR == 1 { print $3 } ' | xargs kill && exit
scripts.node: curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_10.x | sudo -E bash - && apt-get install nodejs
scripts.addons: apt-get install build-essential clang libdbus-1-dev libgtk-3-dev libnotify-dev libgnome-keyring-dev libgconf2-dev libasound2-dev libcap-dev libcups2-dev libxtst-dev libxss1 libnss3-dev gcc-multilib g++-multilib curl gperf bison python-dbusmock xvfb
